sub_title: Design Director | Head of Product Design | Design Lead with 10+ years of experience in E-commerce | IT | Telecom | FinTech | Banking and Digital domains
summary:
Design Director, Head of Product Design and Design Lead with 10+ years of experience in E-commerce, IT, Telecom, FinTech, Banking, and Digital domains, focusing on building great teams and achieving business goals in SberMegaMarket, MTS Group, Ozon, SberTech and Touch Bank.

My strengths include product design, integrated communication strategy, brand identity, digital marketing, and creative and art direction.

Among the achievements in the last few years alone, I would note:

✅ In 3 months, rebranded across all platforms: web, adaptive, iOS, Android, when SberMegaMarket replaced the Goods brand.

✅ Built expertise in product and communication design, UX research, and product editing from scratch. By the end of the year, the NPS had increased from 32 to 41.

✅ Managed a team of up to 38 professionals: product and communication designers, researchers, and product editors.

✅ Reduced time to market (T2M) from 7 to 4 days.

I believe in the ability of thoughtful design to provide the best way to achieve user goals by providing meaningful and relevant user interaction with the product.

Passionate about art, design research, branding, team management, business development, CJM, and building products that people and businesses are love to use. 

🌍 Ready to remote work.

💬 Telegram: @artwalek
📧 Email: ya@artwalek.ru 

► Areas of responsibilities: Design management | Design leadership | Branding | Brand identity | Design strategy | Brand strategy | Digital product design | UX research | Product editoria l UX writing | Team management and motivation | Leadership

► Software Tools: Figma | Adobe Creative Suite | Miro | Sketch | Jira | Notion 

► Skills: Knowledge of the Design Thinking methodology and process | Solid understanding of current web technologies and native desktop interaction patterns | Strong, clean, elegant, and innovative design sense | User-centered design skills - detail-oriented with a deep understanding of design fundamentals | Proven track record of guiding teams in framing and solving complex problems | Experience working in cross-functional teams (product, design, engineering, marketing, research) | Highly skilled at stakeholder management

projects.title: Late time courier delivery in Ozon
projects.description:
We've split dispatching of Moscow orders into several flows by time and succeed to offer to our cliets an option to choose narrow time intervals of delivery, including late time after 6pm.
As a result, our daily delivery planning has improved significantly, and we've covered the audience that would like to get an order at home after working time (which was especially important for our heavy SKUs).

authors.headline: Design Director | Head of Product Design | Design Lead with 10+ years of experience in E-commerce | IT | Telecom | FinTech | Banking and Digital domains

profile_positions.description:
SberMegMarket one of the largest e-commerce marketplaces with 15 million unique visitors, 10,000 sellers, and 10 million products.

- Responsible for the entire digital design across 4 streams: a) Buying - storefront and internal services, b) Merchant - merchant platform, c) Operations - internal logistics systems and contact center, and d) Marketing.
- Managed a team of 38 people: product and communication designers, researchers, and product editors.
- Assembled a solid and motivated team from scratch. Among the designers were many graduates of the British Higher School of Design.
- On day-to-day activities, conducted art-directed of 12 platform products: web, adaptive, iOS, and Android. 
- F-inalized the brand identity, the Tone of Voice, and the Brand book. 

Achievements:

1. Built from scratch expertise in product and communication design, UX research, and product editing. By the end of 2022, the NPS increased from 32 to 41.
2. In 3 months, rebranded SberMegaMarket across all platforms: web, adaptive, iOS, and Android.
3. Rebuilt and tuned up the entire design process: from problem-setting to production. 
4. Reduced time-to-market (T2M) of building layouts from 7 days to 4 days.
5. Raised team leads in 5 areas: B2C, B2B, communication design, UX research, and product editorial.
profile_positions.title: Design Director

profile_positions.description:
Leading telecommunications group in Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia with 80M clients.

- Created, supported, and distributed the MTS design system for 95 internal projects.
- Hired and onboarded 17 product designers. 
- Supervised the design department of 5 people. Mentored and helped the design team grow professionally.
- Built a design culture within the company.
- Art direction of 35+ internal and external products (web, mobile, internal communications).
- Formated product design strategy for internal products.

Achievements:

1. MTS Investments mobile application was developed from scratch and launched in 6 months.
2. The UI interface for top managers' negotiations was developed from scratch and launched in 3 months.
3. Created, supported, and distributed the MTS design system for 97 internal projects.
profile_positions.title: Head of Product Design

profile_positions.description:
OTP Group's neo-banking startup

- Designed mobile bank interfaces on iOS, Android, and web platforms.
- Supervised the work of 2 designers (art direction).
- Designed the multicurrency service interface, which helps save money on currency purchases. 
- Redesigned "Transfers and Payments", "Cards" and "Transaction History" sections in the Internet Bank.
- Redesigned the debit and credit card application forms.
- Designed the interface of the rewards program in the online banking facility.
- Participated in the development of the bank's new design system.

Achievements:

1. Redesigned "Transfers and Payments", "Cards" and "Transaction History" sections in the Internet Bank and launched them in less than 7 months.
2. Redesigned application forms for debit and credit cards for 2 million bank clients.
profile_positions.title: Design Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Designed the interface and came up with the visual style of the iOS app for sending and requesting feedback on collaborative work.
- Worked on the payroll modeling interface and mass transfer of employees from the old staffing structure to the new one.
- Developed a new interface for Sberbank's ATMs.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Designer

profile_positions.description:
- Invented a new shopping basket interface, checkout process and implemented a new style.
- Completely redesigned the interface of the Help section of the Ozon website.
- Redesigned the product card with an emphasis on selling related products.
- Redesigned the home page taking into account the new guidelines.
profile_positions.title: Product Designer

profile_positions.description: - Launched and supported existing intranet portal services.
profile_positions.title: Product Designer
